articles.title: Greetings to President of Tunisia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Tunisia
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Al Beji Caid Essebssi, president of Tunisia, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Tunisia greater success in their work for realizing the stability of the country and national unity and achieving the economic development.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Iran
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Iran
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Hassan Rouhani, president of Iran, on the occasion of the New Year of Iran.
					 The message expressed the conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president of Iran greater successes in his responsible work for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and achieving economic development.

articles.title: Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
articles.content:
Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a message of greeting to Eshaq Jahangiri, first vice-president of Iran, on the occasion of its New Year.
					 The message wished him good health and happiness and Iran new progress and prosperity.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Sungri Automobile Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Sungri Automobile Complex
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of Sungri Automobile Complex.
					 He went round various places of the complex to learn in detail about production.
					
					 There took place on the spot a consultative meeting where he called for making efforts to implement the behests of the leaders and the Party policy in the do-or-die spirit like the creators of the spirit of Kangwon Province, and where measures are taken to accelerate the updating of the production processes and solve the issues arising in the serial production of lorries.
					
					 The premier also discussed the measures to settle the issues arising in further perfecting the processes of serial production of new-type tractor engines and improving the quality of hosiery to meet the tastes and requirements of the customers when inspecting the Sunchon Engine Factory and the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory.

articles.title: U.S. Administration's Bid to Threaten DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Administration's Bid to Threaten DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Monday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. Administration tried to threaten the DPRK and impose pressure upon it, taking advantage of U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson's tour of Japan, south Korea and China:
					 Tillerson admitted the failure of the U.S. efforts to denuclearize the DPRK for 20 years and end of Obama's policy of "strategic patience" during his recent tour of those countries. He said that the U.S. would militarily counteract to the DPRK's threat to the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 Now Tillerson is repeating what Obama touted much sanctions until he left the White House.
					
					 What matters is that neither Obama nor Tillerson knows the reason why the DPRK had to have access to nuclear weapons and why it is dynamically bolstering up the nuclear force.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is the treasured sword of justice and the most reliable war deterrence to defend the socialist motherland and the life of its people.
					
					 The U.S. should face up to the situation of the world with its eyes wide open.
					
					 The DPRK has the will and capability to fully respond to any war the U.S. would like to ignite.
					
					 If the businessmen-turned U.S. authorities thought that they would frighten the DPRK, they would soon know that their method would not work on the latter.
					
					 The world will soon witness what eventful significance the great victory won by the DPRK in the recent ground jet test of Korean-style high-thrust engine will carry.

articles.title: U.S. "Anti-terrorism War" Denounced by KCNA
articles.content:
U.S. "Anti-terrorism War" Denounced by KCNA
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Ten-odd years have passed since the U.S. started the "war on terrorism" worldwide under the pretext of "retaliating against Sept. 11 incident," styling itself a "guardian of justice." 
					 The Korean Central News Agency released an indictment in this regard on March 19.
					
					 The "anti-terrorism war" of the U.S. is state-sponsored terrorism and a new version of war of aggression against the anti-U.S. countries for realizing the imperialists' ambition for world domination, the indictment said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. has wantonly infringed upon the sovereignty and territorial integrity of other countries while escalating the "anti-terrorism war" worldwide.
					
					 It is the strategy and purpose of the U.S. "war on terrorism" to train terrorists and steadily spread terrorism on one hand and perpetrate military intervention in sovereign states under the signboard of "combating terrorism" on the other and, furthermore, carry out their scenario for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. forces, which were deployed mainly in Europe during the Cold War era, are being reorganized, centering around Asia in the new century.
					
					 The U.S. is trebling and quadrupling the sanctions against the DPRK and escalating the danger of a nuclear war, labeling it "proliferator of weapons of mass destruction" and "rogue state," etc. though it has nothing to do with terrorism.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. "anti-terrorism war" is a new form of brutal war of aggression for bringing down the anti-U.S. independent countries and realizing its ambition for world domination.
					
					 Noting that the ''anti-terrorism war" of the U.S. brought to light its true colors as the worst human rights abuser and the world's biggest anti- human rights country, the indictment further said:
					
					 Left in Afghanistan and Iraq for more than decade are marks of cruel genocide and human rights abuses committed by U.S. troops, the brutes engrossed in murder and plunder.
					
					 The U.S. is the only country which approved the operation of secret prisons like Nazis' concentration camps not only in Iraq and Afghanistan but different parts of the world for putting inmates to medieval torture.
					
					 The U.S. authorities patronized and backed U.S. troops' maltreatment and torture of prisoners, underscoring the need to torture prisoners in order to force "terrorists" to divulge secrets.
					
					 The U.S. military operation on "terrorism" by use of drones is an operation of man-killing in breach of international law and the principle of humanitarianism.
					
					 The U.S. has deployed thousands of latest drones equipped with missiles and satellite guide-system in the Middle East and their controllers are conducting air-raids by drones at the operation base in the mainland far away from battle fields.
					
					 The U.S. "war on terrorism" is an extra-large crime against humanity that spawned the worst refugee problem by causing ceaseless terrorism, vicious cycle of revenges and blood-stained armed conflict.
					
					 The crime-woven history of the U.S. "anti-terrorism war" can never be forgotten no matter how much water may flow under the bridge as it has inflicted horrible deaths, pain and misfortunes upon humankind, the indictment stressed.

articles.title: Preparations for World Taekwon-Do Championships Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for World Taekwon-Do Championships Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships are in full swing in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to Kim Chol Ryong, department director of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, an organizing committee involving experts and others concerned was formed.
					
					 Diverse projects have been pushed forward for the successful championships to be held for the third time in the DPRK, the cradle of Taekwon-Do.
					
					 Modernization and repair of the Taekwon-Do Hall are under way at the final stage. Its total floor space was expanded and its interior including training rooms for martial arts and Go, rooms for referees and press conference and resting rooms spruced up.
					
					 The hall, opened on September 10, 1992, was the venue for the world Taekwon-Do championships twice and the World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championship.
					
					 An emblem for the championships was already designed.
					
					 Meanwhile, Taekwon-Do players of the DPRK are training hard to prove successful at the championships.

articles.title: Electric Light Decoration Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Electric Light Decoration Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Electric light decoration is being carried out in Ryomyong Street which nears its completion in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to Ri In Yong, director of the Songyong Electric Light Decoration Institute, the decoration has been pushed forward together with the construction of the street.
					
					 It will add architectural beauty to all buildings in the street with different effects of nocturnal lighting.
					
					 Now, many high-rise apartment buildings including a 70-storied one were decorated with electric lights.

articles.title: Loach Dish Promoted in DPRK
articles.content:
Loach Dish Promoted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Big effort has been made to improve the people's diet in the DPRK.
					 As a part of the effort, the loach cooking competition took place under the sponsorship of the Public Catering Management Bureau of the Pyongyang City People's Committee some days ago.
					
					 Displayed at the competition were more than 250 kinds of loach dishes made by cooks of well-known restaurants in the city.
					
					 The competition was held, divided into the one for making compulsory dishes and the other for presenting 10-odd ready-made dishes.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the competition served as an important occasion in further developing national cuisines and improving the people's diet.
					
					 The public catering establishments in local areas are also encouraged to serve loach dishes.
					
					 Loach dishes are known as one of health foods among Koreans for its high rate of digestion and absorption and special efficacy for recovery of liver function.
					
					 Loach soup, in particular, has been considered as a tonic food from olden times.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Military Maneuvers Condemned as Source of Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Military Maneuvers Condemned as Source of Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The root cause of escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula is large-scale joint military maneuvers conducted by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula always remains tense as the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have waged the saber-rattling every year under the pretext of "annual".
					
					 The ruling quarters of the U.S. are now crying for preemptive strike on the DPRK.
					
					 It is the shameless American way of judgment to decry the just self-defensive drills of the DPRK on its land as "provocation". It is also the brazen American logic to justify their aggression war moves for sinister purpose on other's land as "defensive and annual".
					
					 By nature the U.S. emerged with aggression and has grown wealthy with wars. Thus it can not survive even a moment without invading others.
					
					 That's why nuclear sword for self-defense is needed to fight against the U.S. running amuck with nuclear stick of aggression. The DPRK's access to powerful nuclear deterrence serves as the only way for finally settling the standoff with the U.S. and as an absolute guarantee for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula. This is the truth taught by the past history.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will as ever take self-defensive measures for nuclear deterrence in succession now that the high-ranking authorities of the U.S. still insist on the hostile policy towards it, running amuck without discretion.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Moves against North Will Be Foiled: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Moves against North Will Be Foiled: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces who started the Foal Eagle joint military drills for aggression on Mar. 1 kicked off from March 13 the Key Resolve joint military drills the core of which is the all-out attack against the north through the rapid deployment of the U.S. reinforcements on the Korean peninsula and through the coordinated operation with the puppet forces in contingency. 
					Nuclear strategic assets including nuclear aircraft carriers and strategic bombers together with huge aggression armed forces are massively hurled into south Korea and special units of the three wings of the U.S.  forces are involved in the drills.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary slams the said-fact as extremely reckless nuclear attack drills designed to make a preemptive surprise attack upon the DPRK, not "annual ones for defense".
					
					Citing facts that the warmongers have made desperate efforts to ignite a war against the north, the commentary goes on:
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' war drills against the north are an extremely reckless action to bring nuclear disaster to the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and, furthermore to other parts of the world.
					
					It stands to reason that the DPRK is taking resolute military counteraction to frustrate the evermore escalated aggressive challenges of warmongers at home and abroad.
					
					The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces show no mercy at all to aggressors who hurt the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit. The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should cool their heads heated with war hysteria against the north and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Hwang Kyo An of His Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Hwang Kyo An of His Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- No sooner had Park Geun Hye been impeached than traitor Hwang Kyo An, acting "president" of south Korea, phoned Defense Minister Han Min Gu and Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se. Hwang cried out for "full readiness" and "tightened cooperation" with the U.S. to cope with someone's "provocation."
					 In his "statement to people" concerning Park's impeachment he spouted a string of rubbish about "nuclear and missile threat from the north" and "firm security." At a security meeting later, he urged the puppet army to keep itself on its toe, talking about "possibility of provocation from the north." Then he went so far as to make his appearance at the wartime command center of the joint chiefs of staff of the puppet army, where he shouted an "emergency case has occurred" and ordered the warmongers to buckle down to preserving "firm security."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 It is a trite method of the group of the puppet conservatives in south Korea to kick up a row of "security crisis" under the pretext of "north's provocation" whenever it finds itself in a pretty fix.
					
					 Such inveterate bad habit has been manifested by traitor Hwang's tongue-lashing. This is, indeed, ridiculous.
					
					 No matter how vociferously Hwang may talk about "security crisis" to create the atmosphere of "uneasiness" in south Korea, he can never put under carpet the hideous crimes he committed in conspiracy with traitor Park nor avoid the public criticism focused on his group.
					
					 Hwang, a pro-Park element, should be thrown into the dustbin of history as early as possible.

articles.title: KCNA Terms U.S. Worst Rogue State
articles.content:
KCNA Terms U.S. Worst Rogue State
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Another hacking case spearheaded by the U.S. was disclosed, sparking off a worldwide furor.
					 Whistleblower website WikiLeaks on March 7 revealed the hacking of mobile phones and other e-media by the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency in recent years, citing its more than 8 771 cyber intelligence files as evidence.
					
					 According to it, the CIA reorganized its structure to serve the purpose of carrying out cyber strategy with direct approval of the administration, and has conducted espionage with all means and methods involved.
					
					 It hacks and steals telephone talks before they are encoded, plants "weeping angel", a program developed by it, in TVs, enabling the wiretapping of dialogues nearby even when the TVs are switched off.
					
					 After stealing data, it left fake access mark, to give impressions that hacking was done by Russia, China, Iran and other countries. 
					
					 This proves that the U.S. is a hacking empire and the worst rogue state which stoops to any infamy to realize its ambition for world domination.
					
					 Cyber space is one of the preemptive attack means which the U.S. prioritizes along with nuclear stick and dollars in realizing its hegemonic strategy.
					
					 From long ago, the U.S. regarded cyber space as the fifth area for world domination next to sky, land, sea and outer space, and set up units specializing in cyber warfare far back in the 1990s.
					
					 It set up cyber command in May 2010 and in Oct. 2012, it saw to it that secret executive order was issued to make it possible to mobilize all means for hacking attack and mount a preemptive attack on any country without advance warning.
					
					 Its aim is to hack into countries and regions developing politics, military, economy and other huge fields with the introduction of internet, foment confusion and realize with ease its ambition for world domination.
					
					 It is for this reason that the targets of the cyber attack of the U.S. covers the whole world, in effect, ranging from anti-U.S. and independent countries like the DPRK, its potential rivals like Russia and China and its competitive allies to even its stooges.
					
					 At the annual security consultative council with the south Korean puppet forces in 2015, the U.S. discussed the issue of staging joint cyber drills targeting the DPRK and intensified education concerning them and has been busy putting them into practice.
					
					 From several years ago, the U.S. set up CNE hack tracking software in the computer network of the DPRK with an aim to gather major information. In Dec. 2014, it mounted a massive attack on intranet of the DPRK.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. has made desperate efforts to brand the DPRK as a hacking criminal while describing itself as the biggest victim of cyber attack whenever an opportunity presented itself. This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to brand the DPRK as a criminal of cyber terrorist attack and create an atmosphere favorable for carrying out cyber warfare of preemptive attack is a pipedream.
					
					 The U.S. is the worst rogue state.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 9.
					 Javid Ahmad, director of the Administrative Department of the Kuwait Times who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 9 to April 16 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and discussed its action program to organize political and cultural events including a celebration meeting, seminar and film show.

articles.title: DPRK's Rocket Launching Drill Supported by Belarus Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Rocket Launching Drill Supported by Belarus Organization
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus issued a statement on March 13 in support of the ballistic rocket launching drill staged by Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK launched four ballistic rockets capable of striking the U.S. military bases in Japan in contingency with nuclear warheads loaded.
					
					 This can be called a positive event.
					
					 The ballistic rocket launching drill made the U.S., which has held the unprecedented large military drills on the Korean peninsula to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK, come to its senses.
					
					 The UN is negatively reacting to the DPRK's rocket launching drill.
					
					 This proves that the UN obliged to guarantee the world peace and security is no more than a waiting maid of the U.S.

articles.title: Austrian Body Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Austrian Body Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria on March 14 sent a letter of protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills targeting the DPRK to the U.S. embassy and south Korean puppet embassy in Vienna.
					 Bitterly denouncing the large-scale military drills now under way, the letter went on:
					
					 The joint military drills held by the U.S. and south Korea every year are dangerous ones driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war and a blatant challenge to the world peace and security. 
					
					 The nuclear war drills against the DPRK must immediately be stopped and the U.S. has to withdraw its troops from south Korea unconditionally.
					
					 It is natural for the DPRK, which is firmly defending its sovereignty and dignity, to take stronger military counteraction to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 The U.S. should not push the world to the nuclear disaster but opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el Ano Nuevo de Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el Ano Nuevo de Iran
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, Hassan Rouhani, con motivo del Ano Nuevo de este pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos responsables del destinatario para defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y lograr el desarrollo economico y expreso la conviccion de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones bilaterales de amistad y cooperacion.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju dirige en terreno el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju dirige en terreno el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju dirigio en el terreno los trabajos del Complejo Automovilistico Sungri. 
					Al recorrer varios lugares del complejo, el hizo conocimiento detallado del estado productivo. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se dio enfasis en dinamizar la campana para materializar cabalmente los legados de los lideres antecesores y las politicas del Partido como lo hicieron los creadores del Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon y se buscaron las medidas para acelerar la modernizacion de los procesos productivos y producir en cadena los camiones. 
					
					Por otra parte, Park recorrio la Fabrica de Motor de Sunchon y la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang y discutio las medidas para perfeccionar mas los procesos de produccion en cadena de los motores de tractor de nuevo modelo y mejorar la calidad de medias conforme al gusto y demanda de los clientes.

articles.title: Portavoz de cancilleria coreana censura a administracion norteamericana
articles.content:
Portavoz de cancilleria coreana censura a administracion norteamericana
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC presentada en relacion con que la administracion norteamericana intento amenazar y presionar a la RPDC con motivo de la visita del secretario de Estado a los alrededores de la RPDC, el portavoz de la cancilleria coreana dio el dia 20 la respuesta siguiente:
					Ultimamente, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Tillerson viajo a Japon, el Sur de Corea y China. En esa ocasion reconocio que fueron fracasados todos los esfuerzos de EE.UU. realizados durante 20 anos por la desnuclearizacion del Norte de Corea y ya se acabo la politica de "paciencia estrategica" de Obama, y dijo que si el Norte de Corea amenaza a EE.UU. y sus aliados, le enfrentara militarmente.
					
					Ahora, Tillerson repite invariablemente las palabras de sancion que Obama pronunciaba hasta los ultimos dias en la Casa Blanca.
					
					Lo problematico reside en que tanto Obama como Tillerson no saben la razon por la cual la RPDC se vio obligada a tomar el camino de desarrollar las armas nucleares y fortalecerlas mas ahora.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC devienen el justo remedio omnipotente que defiende la patria socialista y la vida del pueblo coreano y sirven del mas fidedigno disuasivo de guerra.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver correctamente el mundo.
					
					La RPDC tiene la voluntad y capacidad de responder con gusto a cualquier guerra que desea EE.UU.
					
					Si las autoridades norteamericanas, de origen empresario, trataron de asustar a la RPDC, conoceran pronto que tales tentativas no surtiran ningun efecto para este pais asiatico.
					
					El mundo podra ver pronto el historico significado que tiene la gran victoria lograda esta vez por la RPDC en la reciente prueba en el terreno de la expulsion del motor de gran capacidad de tipo coreano.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea divulgo el dia 19 un acta de revelacion en relacion con que transcurrieron mas de 10 anos desde cuando Estados Unidos lanzara la "guerra antiterrorista" contra todo el mundo reclamando la venganza del incidente del 11 de septiembre y creyendose el "defensor de la justicia".
					La "guerra antiterrorista" resulta un acto del terrorismo de Estado y nueva version de la agresion contra los paises antiyanquis para realizar la ambicion imperialista de tomar la hegemonia mundial, adelanta el documento y continua:
					
					Ampliandola a todas partes del mundo, EE.UU. violo flagrantemente la soberania y la integridad territorial de los Estados soberanos.
					
					La estrategia y objetivo de ella es formar, por una parte, a los terroristas a fin de propagar el terrorismo y por la otra, frecuentar la intervencion armada en otros Estados soberanos bajo el pretexto de "eliminacion del terrorismo" y realizar a la larga su ambicion de dominar todo el mundo.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas, que estuvieron desplegadas principalmente en Europa durante la Guerra Fria, se reestructuran en el nuevo siglo dando enfoque a Asia.
					
					EE.UU. tildo a la RPDC, que no tiene nada que ver con el terrorismo, de "pais proliferante de armas de exterminio masivo" y de "Estado bribon", le da las doble y triple sanciones y recrudece la amenaza de guerra nuclear.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran claramente que la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. deviene la nueva forma de agresion orientada a derrocar a los paises antiyanquis e independientes y realizar la ambicion de dominar el mundo.
					
					La "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. puso al desnudo su fachada del violador No.1 de derechos humanos y peor criminal en la misma esfera.
					
					Aunque pasaron mas de 10 anos, siguen frescas en Afganistan e Irak las huellas de masacre y violacion de derechos humanos, cometidas por las tropas norteamericanas acostumbradas al asesinato y saqueo.
					
					EE.UU. es el unico pais que instalo por doquier del mundo, sobre todo en Irak y Afganistan, las prisiones secretas semejantes a los campos de concentracion de los Nazis, y autorizo aplicar en ellas las torturas medievales.
					
					Las autoridades estadounidenses defienden los maltratos y torturas a los detenidos por parte de los uniformados norteamericanos, diciendo que la tortura es necesaria para hacer hablar a los "terroristas".
					
					La operacion militar "antiterrorista" con drones de EE.UU. es una carniceria que contraviene al derecho internacional y a los principios humanitarios.
					
					En el Medio Oriente estan desplegados miles de drones ultramodernos equipados con misiles y teledirigidos por satelite y sus controladores ejecutan el asalto aereo con ordenadores desde la base de operacion en el territorio estadounidense.
					
					La "guerra antiterrorista" deviene un gran crimen antietico que produjo el problema de refugiados mas grande de la historia al generar el circulo vicioso de terrorismo y venganza y ensangrentados litigios armados.
					
					No se olvidara nunca la historia de "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. que impuso a la humanidad la muerte tragica, sufrimientos y desgracias.

articles.title: EE.UU. es el peor Estado bribon: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. es el peor Estado bribon: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se produce gran revuelo en el ambito mundial al conocerse otro incidente de hacking cometido por EE.UU.
					El pasado dia 7, WikiLeaks dio a la publicidad 8 mil 771 documentos de una oficina de inteligencia cibernetica de la CIA revelando que en los ultimos anos este aparato cometio sin parar en escala mundial la pirateria informatica sobre los telefonos celulares y los medios electronicos. 
					
					Segun WikiLeaks, la CIA reformo su estructura a favor del cumplimiento de la estrategia cibernetica, bajo la aprobacion directa de la administracion, y movilizo todos los medios y metodos en el espionaje. 
					
					Hurta las llamadas de los celulares antes de ser cifradas y desarrollo el programa llamado "weeping angel" que se instala en los televisores para interceptar los dialogos aun en el estado de apagado.
					
					Y aplica los metodos astutos para hacer creer que el hacking fue cometido por Rusia, China, Iran y otros paises. 
					
					El hecho comprueba de nuevo que EE.UU. es el imperio de hacking y peor Estado bribon que hace cualquier cosa para satisfacer su ambicion de dominar el mundo.
					
					Para EE.UU., el espacio cibernetico es uno de los medios de ataque preventivo tan importante como el garrote nuclear y el dolar. 
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, lo considera como quinta esfera para la hegemonia mundial despues del cielo, la tierra, el mar y el cosmos y fundo ya en la decada de 1990 las unidades especializadas en la guerra cibernetica. 
					
					Organizo en mayo de 2010 la comandancia cibernetica y en octubre de 2012, emitio la orden secreta del presidente que permite movilizar todos los medios en el hacking contra cualquier pais y atacarlo preventivamente. 
					
					Su verdadera intencion es confundir en un instante con el hacking a los paises y regiones, que desarrollan la politica, los asuntos militares, la economia y otros dominios mediante la aplicacion del Internet, y realizar facilmente la ambicion de tomar la hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Pues, los blancos de ataque cibernetico de EE.UU. son la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros paises independientes y antiyanquis, los rivales potenciales como Rusia y China, los aliados contrincantes y hasta los paises satelites. 
					
					En 2015, convoco la reunion consultiva anual de seguridad con los titeres surcoreanos en que acordo intensificar los ejercicios conjuntos y la educacion sobre la guerra cibernetica contra la RPDC y los puso en practica.
					
					Desde hace varios anos, instalo el programa de hacking CNE en la red de computadoras de la RPDC a fin de recoger las informaciones importantes y en diciembre de 2014, cometio el ataque cibernetico contra las paginas Web de la RPDC. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. habla como si fuera la mayor victima de ataque cibernetico y esta desesperado para tildar a la RPDC de hacker, lo cual es el climax de cinismo. 
					
					Es una ilusion nunca realizable el intento del peor Estado bribon de preparar el ambiente favorable al cumplimiento de la guerra cibernetica.
